item.description:
I may very well be one of the only people haven't seen This Is Spinal Tap, but I've still heard a lot about the film.

This film has a strong cult following and may very well be one of the most famous mockumentaries of all time. It focuses on an aging British heavy metal band. It is done by the same people who have brought you such other great mockumentaries as Waiting for Guffman, Best in Show and A Mighty Wind. It's directed by Rob Reiner and also features Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer (of the Simpsons and A Mighty Wind) and Fran Drescher (TV's "The Nanny").

This is part of the Brattle's "The 80s Rock!" series, and should be a good excuse to see a comedy.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be holding a meetup sign at the front of the theater when the film is over.
item.name: This Is Spinal Tap
